proofs.label: Scalar Field EoM
Einstein Field Equations
proofs.goal: Verify Einstein equations from action variation
proofs.wolfram_code:
(* Metric variation of Einstein-Hilbert action *)
                (* δS/δg^μν = R_μν - (1/2)g_μν R = 8πG T_μν *)
                Solve[R - (1/2) * g * R == 8 * Pi * G * T, {R}]

proofs.label: Proton Lifetime tau_p
Orch-OR Collapse Time
proofs.wolfram_code:
hbar = 1.055 * 10^(-34); (* J*s *)
                EG = 10^(-32); (* J - gravitational self-energy *)
                tau = hbar / EG;
                N[tau * 1000, 3] (* milliseconds *)

proofs.label: G2 Maximal Subgroup
proofs.goal: Verify G2 -> SU(3) branching for color
proofs.wolfram_code:
(* G2 contains SU(3) as maximal subgroup *)
                (* Branching: 7 -> 1 + 3 + 3bar under SU(3) *)
                7 == 1 + 3 + 3

proofs.label: Third Betti Number
proofs.wolfram_code:
(* For TCS G2 with K3 x S3/Gamma structure *)
                (* b3 = b2(K3) x b1(S3/Gamma) + ... = 22 + 2 = 24 *)
                22 + 2
